Description: Normal 0 false false false EN-US JA X-NONE Stellar Mercury 002 Classic –Black, Singlecut Archtop Electric Guitar The Factory Direct Music difference Manufacturer direct savings 30-Day money back guarantee 5-year warranty We love our customers! All guitars are professionally setup in-house prior to shipping by our resident guitar luthier who brings his knowledge from his time working as a PRS neck-specialist in Maryland to your guitar today Florida-based family-owned musical instrument distributor, since 2001 Condition and Comments · Pre-owned: There is a white residue on the black plastic electronic covers that will not come off as well as some discoloration to the clearcoat over the binding which makes it look “aged”. Besides these cosmetic blemishes this guitar is in excellent condition and plays great! · That’s one classy looking guitar! This guitar comes made out of a mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany bolt on neck. It also has a dark rosewood fretboard. The entire guitar is painted a wonderful looking mirror black that combined with the multiply binding around the body makes the guitar look very high class! The fretboard is rich and dark which also gives an excellent contrast to the shine of the highly detailed pearloid inlays. This guitar has two Stellar NSR humbucker pickups. These gold plated pickups give the guitar long sustains that sound excellent with a classic tone that is exactly what you would expect from this kind of guitar. The D-Shape slimline neck is as fast as you are. The medium jumbo frets are shiny, professionally crowned & leveled by hand. Specs Body: Mahogany body, multiply binding, polyurethane clear finish Neck: 24.75” scale, D-Shape profile neck, 1 11/16” nut, polyurethane clear finish Fretboard: Dark rosewood, medium jumbo frets, pearloid Inlays, cream binding Headstock: Angled headstock, painted black on face, multiply binding Electronics: x2 Stellar NSR humbucker pickups, 2x volume knob, 2x tone knob, 3-way toggle switch Hardware: Stoptail bridge, diecast tuners, Gold hardware MER002C-BK
Title: Stellar Mercury 002 Classic – Black, Singlecut Archtop Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: There is a white residue on the black plastic electronic covers that will not come off as well as some discoloration to the clearcoat over the binding which makes it look “aged”.  Besides these cosmetic blemishes this guitar is in excellent condition and plays great!
